China of the hook on human rights for helping out with North Korea?

Apr 20, 2003

When the “United States, for the first time in a decade, decides not to submit a UN resolution censuring China for human rights violations.” Did it have anything to do with North Korea? The Bush administration denies that it does, but this short post on Kevin Drum’s blog seems to suggest otherwise…

The full story is over here.
